{"id":216775527,"lang":"python3","time":"2 years, 3 months","timestamp":1553265708,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/216775527/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"ZigZag Conversion","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s, n):\n        ans = ''\n        \n        if len(s)==1 or len(s)==0 or len(s)<=n:\n            return s\n        \n        iter = 0\n        while True:\n            try:\n                ans += s[(2*n-2)*iter]\n            except IndexError:\n                    break\n            iter += 1\n    \n        for i in range(1,n-1):\n            iter = 0\n            while True:\n                try:\n                    number = i + (2*n-2)*iter\n                    ans += s[number]\n                except IndexError:\n                    break\n                try:\n                    number = (2*n-2) - i + (2*n-2)*iter\n                    ans += s[number]\n                except IndexError:\n                    break\n                iter += 1\n                \n        iter = 0\n        while True:\n            try:\n                ans += s[(n-1)+(2*n-2)*iter]\n            except IndexError:\n                    break\n            iter += 1\n        \n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
